title-english: Toward a League for the People of the Arab World
creator: Shafik, Doria
description-english: The author refers to her recent visit to a number of Arab countries where she sensed consensus on the need to regard national and feminist struggles as two sides of the same coin so as to win the Arab cause. She finally calls for the establishment of a league for all the Arab peoples.
description-arabic: تتحدث كاتبة المقالة عن تأييد كل من التقت بهم في رحلتها الأخيرة لعدد من الأقطار العربية لضرورة توحيد الكفاح الوطني مع الكفاح النسائي لكسب القضية العربية. وتأمل الكاتبة في إنشاء جامعة للتعبير عن إرادة الشعوب العربية.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
source: From: Toward a League for the People of the Arab World
rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
